sometimes hackers can be a bad aspect of this game mostly on casual. But it is a classic hit with many more great things to come into the near future  of valve and improvements to the game. Still would i recommend to friends and other people? The answer is yes. Even though this game has some downfalls it still is very good and its pro scene is still alive with competative for low clans who want to grow to pro standards like cloud 9 etc. Esports is very alive too with many competitions still going on for this game which is very good for its fanbase too. This game is still very fun and lovely to play just like the old ones. This game is a 10/10 for me and always will be. Thanks valve and continue to grow this game :)
Game is a lot of fun :D I have poured ovef 1k hours into it and have enjoy most of my time playing.  Thanks valve!
